description:
Cai.Today is described as a decentralized betting platform. Users can only use the encrypted currency that is approved by CAI.TODAY to bet, no fiat money involved. According to their website, registered users of CAI.TODAY can create a betting event, choosing from sports events of interest provided by the platform as well as set parameters such as odds, number of participants and the amount of money required.

name: Cai Token
